projects.title: My Projects
projects.descriptionPortfolio: My Portfolio is a responsive web application, designed to showcase my skills and projects. Created with React, it is an example of my determination to learn new technology as a full-stack developer.
projects.description2ndRound: SecondRound revolutionizes the pre-owned video game market with a mobile web app born from a 10-day development challenge, streamlining the trade for sellers and gamers alike.
projects.descriptionKoalapp: Visit stackkoala.online to explore Koalapp: Dynamic, personalized news articles. Articles are fetched from the News API and modified with AI to be more personalized.
projects.descriptionArc: Explore unique stays with Arc, your go-to for easy hotel bookings in France, crafted in a 24-hour coding sprint.
projects.descriptionRental: Explore Rental on stackrental.online: Easy, intuitive car rentals from sedans to SUVs, designed for a seamless online journey.

about.title: About Me
about.mePart1: Hello! My name is {{bold}}. With a deep-seated curiosity and a fervent passion for the digital world, I've fully embarked on a journey as a full-stack developer. My previous experience in IT project management, within an international landscape, honed my leadership and communication skillsâ€”assets I'm now eager to apply in the dynamic realm of software development.
about.mePart2: My transition to full-stack development stemmed from a desire for fresh challenges and a commitment to innovation. Through my training, I've gained proficiency in technologies like Ruby on Rails, JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS. Drawing on my experience as an IT project manager, where I led complex system migration programs, I'm well-equipped to oversee significant software development projects. I'm particularly eager to deepen my expertise in the JavaScript ecosystem, focusing on React, TypeScript, Node.js, and beyond. Full-stack development isn't just a career path for me; it's a passion that I'm excited to explore and expand upon.
about.not_at_desk: When I'm not at my desk...
about.balance_work_play: Don't be fooled by all the coding talkâ€”I firmly believe in the importance of balancing work and play. That's why you might find me at the gym staying fit, hanging out with friends, or enjoying a good Netflix session. I'm always up for an adventure.
